name: TheBlindSpot
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: In this Flash Briefing skill, you will be presented with updates from the blindness community, as well as assistive technology tips. Listen for: When is the next event, or how can I use my device to...
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
